website_summaries.verdict: This fashion version of Ariat’s riding boot is very durable and versatile.
pros: We love how this sturdy full grain leather boot has a side zipper for easy access
Duratread non-marking sole gives good grip
Boots come in a variety of colors and finishes, making them versatile for many outfits
cons: Some natural imperfections in the leather may look more like blemishes
Check foot and calf measurements, since they tend to run small and tight

customer_reviews.title: love but but...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find boots so I would like to give a review. I would say I love this boots but the its too big for my narrow legs. For reference I'm 5'4, size 7, 107lbs.There's other boots on my background but to my surprised it's too narrow. sigh hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Unfortunately these boots haven't held up well. I am very disappointed because I usually love the Ariat brand. Both heels have come apart and I am gluing them back together as we speak :( VERY disappointed! I didn't even wear them that much this spring before the warm weather came, and only about 2 months this fall. Poor quality. These fit like a glove on my feet and are so comfortable! I wear them to work most days during the winter and they do not make my feet sweat like plastic boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Cute while they lasted, which was a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back at the end of October, so I've only had them for a few months. I weight 125 pounds and am 5'6". This is just to give you an idea of my size and to say that I am not "huge" or have monster calves. My calves are average to thin, so I ordered a size Medium fit around the calves. Well, the zipper just broke on them down by the ankle, and I have no way of repairing them. These boots are expensive, so they should have lasted longer than a few monhs. The leather is high-quality and the fit was great. Too bad about the zipper though. :(
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Favorite boots of all time!
customer_reviews.text: These are unquestionably fine quality, comfortable right out of the box, very streamlined all the way to the knee, not too long for someone 5'4". My calves measure 13" and I can wear straight-leg jeans inside or out. The deep burgundy top is so subtle as to visually blend with the black of the boot. I have tried so many knee boots searching for a particular tailored look and I found it in this pair. The heel is chunky and gives a nice boost in height, too. And, the zipper mechanism moves smoothly and easily. Looks good from every angle. I can wear between a size 8.5 and 9: went with the 8.5 and it's perfect even with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Northwest

customer_reviews.title: So fantastic, I'm buying them again
customer_reviews.text: I actually used to own this same exact pair a few years ago - after ~2 years the zipper broke and a shoddy repair job made them super uncomfortable to wear... so I was thrilled to find the same brand/style available for a fraction of what I originally paid! I also already know that once these are broken in, they are absolutely fantastic, very comfortable and well-made. The last pair I had had a little kink in the zipper which is where it ultimately failed, and I don't see that in the new pair so here's hoping they'll last for years and years to come. Although I'm tempted to buy another backup...
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots but the zipper makes a jingle sound when you walk
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are perfect for narrow calves. They are comfortable, stylish, and classic. The leather is high quality and they fit true to size. My only complaint is that the inside zipper has a long pull that jingles as you walk. I considered giving the boots a four star rating because of this. Ideally I could have given 4.5 stars. I'm going to see if I can put an adhesive rubber pad on the inside of the zipper pull to mute or prevent the jingle.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of Ariat
customer_reviews.text: You need skinny calves for this boot and if you have them this is the boot to order. These boots were too tight on my runner daughter but fit my hot yoga, kick boxer. The difference may be between a size 2 and size 4 for muscle mass and body fat. I am a big fan of the Fat Boy boots put out by Ariat. I own 6 pairs of the boots (there is a work boot in there somewhere) and will continue to be a fan of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Love these riding boots.
customer_reviews.text: I've been contemplating replacing my boots for year but never took the time to shop at brick and mortar stores. I decided to try online and took the plunge and ordered several pairs on Amazon. I ordered these as a replacement for ones that didn't quite satisfying and absolutely love them. I usually like a small heal as I'm not too tall but I decided to try my first pair of riding boots. They're comfortable, well-made and nice looking leather. I did buy a half size larger than my street shoe to allow for room for thicker socks and orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Maui cats

customer_reviews.title: Boot Size 8 1⁄2 RM has a 15 inch circumference
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 8 1/2 but sometimes buy size 9 because I have wide feet and high arches. I got these boots in size 8 1/2 based on another reviewer. The boots fit me fine around the toes, just a bit tight around the arches but are softening up a bit after a couple of days of wearing them. I have narrow calves and was hoping the boot circumference for my size would be 14 inches. It's not. It's more like 15 inches, however I'm keeping them because the boot looks really nice anyway, not too loose like most boots look on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do scuff easily, so be careful
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on these boots. They are worth every penny! I tried doing cheaper imitation ones, but you can really tell the difference, especially in comfort and the look of the leather. They do scuff easily, so be careful. They're creased heavily around the ankle for me, but I think that's normal for any boot. I wore them all through fall but avoid wearing them on rainy days or if it's damp outside. The brown leather at the top is a beautiful bordeaux/burgundy brown.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is why I love Ariat
customer_reviews.text: I own several pair of Ariat shoes, western riding boots, english riding boots and now a lovely pair of fashion boots. They fit perfect right out of the box and I wore them for 5 hours the first time out. The quality is wonderful as I expected. I was a little concerned about the calf being too tight after reading several reviews but they were perfect. Ariat just makes a great product and they wear forever. I have a pair of western riding boots that are probably 20 years old and they've been through the barn, muck and saddle on regular basis and probably have another 20 years left in them. Don't buy cheap boots, buy Ariat.
customer_reviews.author: venuspaint

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs a better zipper and larger calf size
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Ariat's and I like the style of this boot but the calf is very narrow and I did have some issues with the zipper not zipping correctly with these boots. the leather doesn't feel cheap but the zipper is an issue especially if you are wearing skinny jeans with these. They look nice and are comfortable but the calf size is small so larger sized calfs would not fit in these/
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I have very large calves for a girl and they are a bit tight but I plan on taking some saddle soap to them and stretching and softening the leather. The 9.5 actually is a bit big around my foot but thats perfect for wool socks in the winter. They are very beautiful and smell like ariat leather! I love that smell. Theyre exactly what I expected and wanted. I had a feeling they would be tight on my calves but leather stretches to fit you when you maintain it well. Super happy! I can see how they would scuff easy but they are real leather its to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Calf Way Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 8.5M, I've never had any issues with calf sizes in other boots but needed to return these as I was not able to zip them over my calf. Very disappointing. I'm 5'5" and 145 lbs with average build. Wider calf sizes were not available so I have to find a different brand. Quality seems fine. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: lifewithpnut

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. The leather is not the greatest quality and got "crinkly" (for lack of a better word) after only one wear, but the boots are beautiful. I've received many compliments. I wear Ariat tall boots for riding and these fit like real riding boots in that they are very stiff and tighter at the ankle and need to drop. I went up a half-size because I didn't want them to fit like riding boots. Once they do drop and stretch a little, they are very comfortable. I've yet to buy a pair of Ariat shoes or boots that are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: formyponies

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite boots.
customer_reviews.text: Love them! A little stiff out of the box, but breaks in nicely after a few wears. I ordered a half size larger, so I can wear thicker socks, when needed. I normally wear 5.5 sandles; 5.5 to 6 for dress shoes; 6 for shoes with socks; 6.5 for athletic shoes. I prefer a slightly looser fit, since my feet swell a little at the end of the day. These fit as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Y. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Real leather boots for $80? Um yes please!! They fit wonderfully and feel so sturdy! Never buying cheap synthetic boots at JCP again! I've only worn them once but I got several compliments! Update: more than 2 years later I still have them as my primary boots. They have some wear and tear on them but that’s because I abuse them and wear them in the rain. Amazing boots!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love thise boots, large but a boot suppose to be larger than you regular shoe size because you used them with Socks and your feet feels better when they are not constricted. I have a lot complements when I were them. Love the, highly recommend this boots.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Ariat York Leather Riding Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these Ariat womens York riding boots! Right out the box they were comfortable and the two tone chestnut/black leather combo was gorgeous. I would expect no less from Ariat.
customer_reviews.author: cinnimon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boot For Slim Calves
customer_reviews.text: I have slim calves (12.5") and small feet (5.5) and 5'1" and have searched for ages for a pair of boots that are practical, as well as stylish. These boots are perfect for me over skinny jeans or thick leggings. They look really nice in the old west black (dark gray with black at the top). Very comfortable and plenty of room at the toe. They don't gape with skinny jeans but gape (only) slightly if I was going to wear them over tihick tights. I am very pleased with these boots and the leather quality is also really great.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W.

customer_reviews.title: great boot and whether you are wearing black
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size, great boot and whether you are wearing black, brown, or anything in between it goes when you choose a black and brown boot...I get compliments on them often and they are so well made with great leather.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots for narrower calves
customer_reviews.text: Cute boot for those of us with narrow calves. The boot circumference is about 14 1/2 inches at the top. I like the aged black leather of the Old West Black. Gives it character..
customer_reviews.author: Kat N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. My second pair of these Ariats just a different color. A little snug around calf at first but they stretched out. Get a lot of complements! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Zajkowski

customer_reviews.title: Love the Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a nice pair of black boots for two years and finally found them! They are well made, great foot bed, and comfortable from the start. Caution - if you have larger calves, these may be too tight. I am athletic, so do not have "pencil legs", and the boots fit snug but are not too tight. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: chocolate lover

customer_reviews.title: Best Way To Break In Boots
customer_reviews.text: Football players must often break in new shoes. Here is a tip that I read written by a professional football player: The best way to break in a new pair of shoes (i.e. boots) is by taking a pair of relatively thick athletic socks, getting them slightly damp and then rub a bar of soap all over them. Walk around with the soapy socks in the shoes (i.e. boots) all day. They will soften to fit your foot perfectly and you will have no blisters! Wow. Using that technique really works! That's how I now break in all my shoes and boots. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Love them “but “
customer_reviews.text: The boot is a perfect fit for my size 9m . Only disappointed in the look of the leather. Almost a Imatation leather look. Hopefully will get a more wrinkled worn look later from wearing.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA MEDLIN

customer_reviews.title: For slim legs (under 12 inches around the calves)
customer_reviews.text: I got my boots recently I was positively surprised how stylish and well made they are. I have pretty slim legs (about 12 inches around the calves) and with skinny jeans on there is hardly any room left. I need to wear my boots a bit more to make them more comfortable to wear. But I love the look, it's exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Dagnall

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to pull my ariat yorks out of the box. They fit perfectly! The calf was perfect- not too tight, not too loose. I like the quality of the leather and zipper. The boots seem very sturdy and well made. I wore them for the first time the day before running a marathon. (Risky, I know!) they were stiff from being new, but I walked around Chicago all evening with no blisters! These boots are very comfortable. I would consider buying the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: rahrey

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot made with excellent Ariat quality, but they were too small. They fit my feet like they were made for me, but I could zip them up only half way, and I do not have a wide calf. I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: NOT up to Ariat's Standard of Quality! Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The boots I received yesterday were NOT up to Ariat's standard of quality. Like a previous reviewer's boots, mine came without proper Ariat documentation and in a plain cardboard box. The leather is inferior as is the fit. I own numerous pairs of Ariat footwear including riding boots, clogs, sandals and dress boots. I've been a loyal Ariat wearer for years. I am incredibly disappointed to think Ariat is producing an inferior product for sale through Amazon. I am returning them. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but narrow!
customer_reviews.text: This boot ran small in the width for me. It was tight and I was afraid it wouldn't loosen up enough for me. Very nice boot made of good leather, would have kept if the fit was good.
customer_reviews.author: Dog lady

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had ordered me a couple different pairs of boots and I didn't have much luck until I tried these. I wear a size 9 and I don't consider my feet to be wide however the others wouldn't even go over the top of my feet. These, however were easy to get on and look really cute. They are very high quality and nicely made boots. I love the color and fit. I am very happy with these boots!
customer_reviews.author: b_n_j

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Ariats. Highly recommend. My new favorite boots. Love the brushed brown look. Super stylish and original. I am petite, and these boots are not too tall for me, not too large in the calf. Work perfectly over skinny jeans and with casual dresses. Sturdy and comfortable. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Consider ordering 1/2 size up from your normal size in this brand
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful as would be expected with Ariat. I always wear a size 7 in Ariat, but am returning these to order a 7 1/2 as they fit very snug on my foot. I would not be able to wear heavy boot socks with them. As far as the calf fitting, I have slender legs and the fit was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: SLK

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as same pair I bought from a nice shoe store and wore through.
customer_reviews.text: The calves on the regular fit are much wider than an exact same pair I bought at a nice shoe store. Seems like the brand changed their manufacturer or something? Oh well. Not bad, just not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots were MORE than what I expected them to be. I LOVE the worn look of them, the color is PERFECT. They are comfortable yet snug. The calf is VERY snug. I thought at first I wouldn't be able to zip them up but they stretched out a bit once I wore them for a day. I like them snug though, looks like a very tailored look conforming to my calf. The construction seems to be of good quality and I expect to have these for years with the natural wear and tear making them better with age.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Balila

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots - Calf of boot runs small
customer_reviews.text: I give these boots 5 stars because they are absolutely beautiful. However, as with many of the reviews, they are small in the calf. I’m hoping they will stretch after some wear.
customer_reviews.author: Karaticia Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather!
customer_reviews.text: These are made of beautiful leather. However, the leather is very stiff and uncomfortable. I ordered my regular size 8 and they fit but so inflexible and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Yokoyama

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and fit of these boots.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and fit of these boots. They appear to be very well made . Also ordered the Nine West Women's Blogger Harness Boot but sent them back because these were way superior in comfort and construction. They fit my slightly large calves just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TuttleShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: I gave it 2 stars because the company did refund me and the boots are very nice looking. I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetic but poorly build. The hill split from the boot after only wearing it twice. I gave it 2 stars because the company did refund me and the boots are very nice looking. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot, very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The burgundy is a very beautiful color and contrasts well with the boot. It is extremely comfortable and the thickness of the leather makes one realize how study and warm these boots really are. I also liked the low heel as opposed to being flat. However, I returned the boot as it was too big for my foot despite trying on the exact same shoe (in another state) in the store.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and well made at a great price. They arrived promptly and were well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter.....she loves them. Very stylish and well made at a great price. They arrived promptly and were well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these boots! Where have they been all my life?? Great arch support and cushioning. Podiatrist approved! Boots fit snug, as they should at first. I have narrow ankles and they are a perfect fit. Medium width would not be good for wider feet. The aged black color give these boots a little something extra while still pretty much black. Love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are everything I was looking for - and I have been looking for a long, long time! Most riding boots are too tall for my 5'3" legs and way too wide in the calf. I read that these were small in the calf for some folks so I thought that maybe I had finally found my boot. I love the antiqued look - makes them look grayish /black. They are comfortable as well. I wore them all day the first time without a problem. Great boot!
customer_reviews.author: buggylady

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but order a half size up!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful and crafted very well. Only issue is that they run small, I ordered my usual size 8.5 and my toes we definitely squished. If you like wearing thick socks order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots but they do not fit larger calves (17in)
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots but they do not fit larger calves (17in). Otherwise they seemed like the great ariat quality I know and love!
customer_reviews.author: jd9085

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Only footgear that both a 53 year old mother and her 16 year old daughter have chosen and deemed wonderful without either looking foolish to peers. Comfort and fit are perfect. Ariat makes the most comfortable, yet elegant, shoes and boots.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn howard

customer_reviews.title: So Happy that I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I was hesitant to order fearing that they would be too tight in the calf. They fit as if they were made for my feet! My calves are average size and I have worn them with leggings and with skinny jeans and have plenty of room. Very comfortable and haven't given me the "these will fit great once they're broken in" feeling. Also very impressed with the quality of the leather and the craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are sooo comfortable! And they look great! I have to have real comfort in shoes in order to wear all day to work and these are definitely that. Plus they look great with dresses, skinny jeans, and more. I've gotten tons of complements on them too. Love the 2-toned look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order with Care
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the boots. Very high quality leather. Well made. I wish I had ordered the next full size up. Even with just stockings, they are tight. Absolutely no room for any type of sock.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Want another Pair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these boots. They fit great and are so comfortable. I got the black/cordovan and they are so classy looking. I've had them 1 week and have gotten so many compliments on them. My western boots are also Ariats and I love them. Ariat makes a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for petites
customer_reviews.text: Being a petite women (5' 1") I've always had a difficult time finding tall boots that don't hit the bottom of my knee. This one fits and looks perfect, stops well below my knee! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The boot is made of a beautiful rich leather, lined on the inside to support the structure of the boot. The two-toned color give the boot an air of sofistication. And on the inside, Ariat's soles provide comfort and support. Best boot I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia N.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Comfortable & sharp looking to dress up or down. I have smaller calves & they fit perfect (not too much gap). Other boots have too big in calf.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ariat boots and have worn the fashion styles and actual equestrian boots for years. They're perfect for people whose backs require well made shoes. The footbed provides such great support my back never hurts when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow in the toe area but I expect them to stretch out with wear. very nice boots!
customer_reviews.author: ally

customer_reviews.title: Good boots. Have had an identical pair purchased in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good boots. Have had an identical pair purchased in a store a few years ago that have worn well (which is why I wanted another pair). Classic and stylish. Must have been a different manufacturing facility as thes had some minor differences that do not seem to make any quality difference as yet. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: rlcbk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful and sooo comfy! Thank you for a great boot!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. I do wish that the zipper was a bit more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen K.

customer_reviews.title: Calf too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Theses boots are beautiful but I had the same problem as others in that the boot was too tight around the calf. I measured my calf and it is 15" if that is of any help. I could not zip it all the way and that was without my pants tucked in.
customer_reviews.author: Margie P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful size 6.5 boots but wayyy too small for my 15 1/2" calfs. So sad!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Quality missed the mark
customer_reviews.text: The heel fell off mid business trip. Fit great. Had high hopes. Probably won’t try again
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Ariat Women's York Boot,Black Cordovan,8.5 M US
customer_reviews.text: not to say others won't love them. love the brand; have had 2 other pr of ariats but my calves are apparently too large for these. very disappointed. ;(
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy boots
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy, sturdy boots. I wear them for outside chores, especially for mowing grass. I originally ordered a 9 M, but they were tight, so I returned them and ordered a 9.5 M. The 9.5 M is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and nice looking boots for an awesome price. I’ve worn them everyday for months and still love them!
customer_reviews.author: Zmom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot, from a company I have trusted with ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot, from a company I have trusted with riding boots for years. this is my first fashion purchase from Ariat and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Too tight- other reviews were not kidding.....
customer_reviews.text: these were definitely made for skinny calves, as the other reviews had mentioned. I also did not realize how dark the red part really is. If these fit well, I would have exchanged them for the lighter brown on the top.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: I was not in love with this boot after trying it
customer_reviews.text: I was not in love with this boot after trying it. I have short legs and the top still seems low.
customer_reviews.author: BMcCall-Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fit, and comfort !
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit very well. I had to do plenty of shopping around to find a good fit and I am very happy with the fit and comfort of these boots. They are not too bulky and don't sag around my ankles. They are also not too wide for my calves, I am slender (size 4) and I had a difficult time finding riding boots that were not too wide. I usually wear a size 8.5 or 9 and am pleased that the 8.5 fits perfectly, even with wool socks they are not too tight. The quality is great, very comfortable and I expect them to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I ordered a half size up as I wanted to wear thick socks under them and they fit perfect. I am pleased with the look and comfort of these boots and would recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! The leather is beautiful and comfortable and I anticipate getting much use out of them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love! Fitted in ankle and calves
customer_reviews.text: Love! Fitted in ankle and calves, which I like. My legs are thin and look swallowed up by really wider fitted boots. Good for slim legs & fitted look!
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Glausier

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for being on your feet all day...and they look great too!
customer_reviews.text: These boots arrived last week and I love the brown /black combination. I treated them with a water protector and wore them later in the week with jeans. I was on my feet all day and I did not experience any foot or leg pain while wearing these boots. They look great with slim fitted jeans or with a long casual dress. The boot are just right for tucking in your jeans and leave you enough wiggle room so your legs don't feel constrained. I would purchase these again...maybe in all black.
customer_reviews.author: BelleBelle

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, ran too small.
customer_reviews.text: Returned to get larger size; larger size TOO larger, so I guess I'm a half size (not in stock.) Too bad because the boot is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! Just what I was looking to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Just what I was looking to purchase. Leather is beautiful, I order my normal size and they feel great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Olena Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous well made boot, sadly too tight
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots, stylish and wonderful leather scent but they were too stiff and tight. I have worn Ariat brand before ( when I used to ride) well made just too stiff for me to walk in, so sadly returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jayregs

customer_reviews.title: They fit like a glove now
customer_reviews.text: Boots run a little small and were very tight at first. But being leather they formed to fit after wearing them. They fit like a glove now. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boots
customer_reviews.text: I just got these boots and they are perfect. I haven't worn them yet but when I tried them on, I can tell they will wear great.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, but they are waaaay too small. I normally wear 8.5, but I could barely get my foot into them. I had to return them, and order a 9.5 instead.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sterk

customer_reviews.title: It runs a little big but I like the fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8. It runs a little big but I like the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Tsementzis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boot for petite women
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I'm 5'1 and 100 lb and always have trouble finding boots that don't have a calf double the size of my leg. The calf opening on these boots (I bought a size 6) is absolutely perfect - I can wear them with a skirt or over jeans. They also feel like excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it fell a good inch or two below my knee whish is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The boot was too short; it fell a good inch or two below my knee whish is not what I expected. Otherwise, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diane OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Love This Boot
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a quest to find a pair of beautiful riding boots that were under $300. My daughter rides horses and has a pair of Ariat boots so I thought I would give these a try. I absolutely love them! Perfect height, beautiful leather, great details. And although I am partial to brown boots, I really love these black/cordovan colored ones. The color on the top just adds a little something to the style and really looks great. Although these are still a little big around my calves (I must have abnormally small calves because I have yet to find a boot that fits them snuggly), they still look great. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: dcolby

customer_reviews.title: Quality control?
customer_reviews.text: I had to send my original items back. The boots were scuffed and had imperfections out of the box. The replacent pair was near perfect but has some minor markings on them. They looked great once I treated them with a leather conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: I have several Ariat boots and have never been disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Come faster than told. Boot fits me perfectly. I have several Ariat boots and have never been disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kara H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Beautiful boot, fits true to size and wonderfuly supportive!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots and perfect!! I was a little worried becuase I have athletic calves but these boots fit wonderfully. I love the Cordovan strip at the top. I would highly recomment these to anyone. I plan to wear them with my skinny jeans and leggings.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, true to size, I wear a 6.5 or 7 and ordered a 7- perfect. A little tight In the shaft at first but I have 14.5 " muscular calves and they totally broke in and quickly, look great. I wear them 2-3x a week. Will miss them when Spring comes, if it ever comes!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots
customer_reviews.text: One of the best boot purchase I've ever made! They are BEAUTIFUL!! Well-made, comfortable and stylish. I wouldn't hesitate to buy anther pair by this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and I was able to wear them all day ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Ariats for horseback riding for many years so I decided to give the non equine boots a try. They fit great and I was able to wear them all day from day one. I have slim calves and most boots are too wide. These were perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Gail Mullaney

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: My aunt was sporting a pair of Ariat boots. I have been looking for the "just right" look and boot! When I saw how good she looked and ordered my own pair from Amazon.com for a much cheaper price, I couldn't have been happier about the fit and the look! Thank you Amazon.com and Aunt K! Love you!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Young

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 6 to see if they would be better. The leather is very stiff
customer_reviews.text: These will be going back. I ordered a 6 to see if they would be better. The leather is very stiff. My heel slips and the left boot shaft seems bigger than the right one. Not as nice as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found a pair of boots that fit my skinny calf, wide forefoot, high arch and skinny heel! I've been wanting for so long but wasn't willing to compromise on fit or tackiness. Thank you Ariat!
customer_reviews.author: S. Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Ariat York Boot
customer_reviews.text: Seems true to size very comfortable zipper broke on second use Ariat very helpful on returning it for repair at no cost. Would recommend it for general use however it is not a true riding boot.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Macy

customer_reviews.title: Ariat.  well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: So, I looked for a long time before spending the money on these boots... guess what, they're totally worth it. Leather is beautiful, boots fit great, can't wait to wear them--bring on fall!
customer_reviews.author: Fred A. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: ... long slender foot really well and these boots are beautiful; they get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Ariat fits my long slender foot really well and these boots are beautiful; they get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Eggers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for petities and excellent quality. I want another pair. Would order again!! Thank You :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: The boots were slightly different colors, as if different dye lot. I was disapointed as they were a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: large calf boots
customer_reviews.text: I am having to return the boots because they are too big for my calf but they are awesome boots! If you have larger a larger calf they would be perfect...for reference mine are 13 inches!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot but....
customer_reviews.text: These boots are gorgeous! ! Ariat is a good brand however, if you have big calfs, it won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

product_meta.title: Ariat Women's York Fashion Boot
product_meta.description:
Polished, equestrian-inspired style is yours in Ariat's York boot. A classic riding silhouette in luxe leather is treated to a contrasting cuff and buckle detailing. A side zip offers easy access to this sophisticated stunner, while discreet goring along the top of the shaft offers a secure fit. For style that takes you from York to New York, look to Ariat for sleek, chic fashion that works.

Ariat was founded with one simple objective: to provide the most technologically advanced riding boots for the world's top equestrian athletes. Today, Ariat is the leading performance footwear and apparel brand for equestrian athletes around the world. From show jumping to team penning, Ariat boots provide the foundation upon which world-class athletes work, ride, and compete.
